thread.title: How can we bridge the gap of inequity in Birmingham's entrepreneurial system?
thread.title_full: How can we bridge the gap of inequity in Birmingham's entrepreneurial system?

author: Guest Voices
title: How can we bridge the gap of inequity in Birmingham's entrepreneurial system?
text: Women also compose the backbone of the modern workforce, holding more than half of college diplomas and entry-level positions at Fortune 500 companies. Innovative programs like Women Who Code, Technovation, Black Girls Code, and locally, the Innovate Birmingham Workforce Program, are all building the supply of women-led startups.
